```{r}
dict_dfm <- convert(dfm_lookup(speech.corpus.dfm, dictionary = mig_dict_full), to = "data.frame")

rm(speech.corpus)
trim_df = hoc.corpus[rowSums(dict_dfm[,-1]) > 0,] # take only those which sum to at least 1
```

```{r}
# valuesdictionary.yaml is a file which contains value regex expressions
values_dict = dictionary(file = "valuesdictionary.yaml", format = "YAML", sep = ",")
trimmed_dfm = dfm(corpus(trim_df), stem=T, remove_numbers = TRUE, remove_punct = TRUE, remove_symbols = TRUE,  remove = stopwords("en"))
values_results <- convert(dfm_lookup(trimmed_dfm, dictionary = values_dict), to = "data.frame")

#values_results[rowSums(values_results[,-1]) > 0,]

```
